questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Drag and drop the Cisco IOS DHCP relay agent configuration commands from the left onto the correct effects on the right.
Select and Place:
//IMG//
Which keyword of the aaa authentication ppp command applies to PAP only?
Which type of NetFlow information is displayed when the show ip flow export command is executed?

choices.C: The device redistributes only classful EIGRP networks into OSPF.
choices.D: EIGRP routes appears in the routing table as E2 OSPF routes.
choices.B: The device redistributes all EIGRP networks into OSPF.
choices.E: The device router ID is set to Loopback0 automatically.
choices.F: EIGRP routes appears as type 3 LSAs in the OSPF database. CD
choices.A: EIGRP routes appears in the routing table as N2 OSPF routes.

discussion.content: C. It allows external clients to connect to a web server hosted on 192.168.1.50.

questions.question_text: Which statement describes what this command accomplishes when inside and outside interfaces are correctly identified for NAT? ip nat inside static tcp 192.168.1.50 80 209.165.201.1 8080 extendable

choices.D: It allows external clients coming from public IP 209.165.201.1 to connect to a web server at 192.168.1.50. C
choices.B: It represents an incorrect NAT configuration because it uses standard TCP ports.
choices.C: It allows external clients to connect to a web server hosted on 192.168.1.50.
choices.A: It allows host 192.168.1.50 to access external websites using TCP port 8080.
